accountId.description: Prisma Account ID from cloud_account table

loggingAccounts.description: List of logging accounts with selected buckets for the given feature

info.description:
You can use the AWS S3 Flow Logs API for AWS S3 onboarding for organization 
and standalone accounts on all supported stacks.
info.title: Prisma Cloud AWS S3 Flow Logs Overview

get.description: Fetches AWS S3 Flow Log feature details of monitored account.

404.description: account_not_exist_or_disabled / AWS Flow Logs S3 feature not configured

get.summary: Fetches AWS S3 Flow Log details

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.prismacloud.io/cloud-accounts-manager/v1/cloud-accounts/aws/{accountId}/features/aws-flow-logs/s3"

headers = {"x-redlock-auth": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"}

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

patch.description: Saves  AWS S3 Flow Log feature details of monitored account.

400.description: invalid_parameter_value / bad_request / missing_required_parameter / Logging account and monitored account are in different partition / logging_account_bucket_not_found / AWS Flow Logs S3 feature not supported for account

patch.summary: Saves AWS S3 Flow Log details

post.description: Checks AWS S3 Flow Log status of monitored account.

400.description: invalid_parameter_value / bad_request / AWS Flow Logs S3 feature not supported for account

post.summary: Checks AWS S3 Flow Log status

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.prismacloud.io/cloud-accounts-manager/v1/cloud-accounts/aws/{accountId}/features/aws-flow-logs/s3/status"

payload = {
    "awsS3FlowLogsLoggingAccountId": 0,
    "bucketIds": [0],
    "buckets": ["string"],
    "loggingAccountId": "string"
}
headers = {
    "content-type": "application/json",
    "x-redlock-auth": "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
}

response = requests.request("POST", url, json=payload, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

tags.description: The AWS S3 Flow Logs endpoints are listed below.
tags.name: Onboarding AWS S3 Flow Logs
